subject: Veterinary Medicine
Horses
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Horse Racing
Cruelty to Animals
lead_paragraph: Dr. Stacey Huntington, a veterinarian based in Springfield, Mo., had examined more than 700 of the Thoroughbred Retirement Foundation’s 1,000 horses at more than a dozen farms.
